snippet.title: Runnersworld - running equipment, marathon training, running shoes from RunnersW
snippet.description: Runnersworld - running equipment, marathon training, running shoes from RunnersW Runnersworld is the UK resource for runners. Purchase running equipment online, read marathon training tips and use our shoes finder.

snippet.title: Walking Connection -- for people who love to walk, hike and travel -- Come Walk
snippet.description: Walking Connection -- for people who love to walk, hike and travel -- Come Walk Information, products and services for people who love to walk, hike and travel.

snippet.title: Los Angeles - MBS Fitness
snippet.description: Los Angeles - MBS Fitness M.B.S Fitness is a service company providing individualized group fitness training in Los Angeles. MBS Fitness provides balanced health and fitness training: including marathon training programs, beginning fitness programs and a track club serving Los Angeles Westside, San Fernando Valley, Santa Monica, South Bay and Southern California.

snippet.title: Los Angeles - MBS Fitness
snippet.description: Los Angeles - MBS Fitness M.B.S Fitness is a service company providing individualized group fitness training in Los Angeles. MBS Fitness provides balanced health and fitness training: including marathon training programs, beginning fitness programs and a track club serving Los Angeles Westside, San Fernando Valley, Santa Monica, South Bay and Southern California.

snippet.title: Westlake Village - Personal Training by Denise
snippet.description: Westlake Village - Personal Training by Denise Denise is a certified personal trainer (CPT)though the National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM). She specializes in functional training for faster results, endurance training and marathon running.

snippet.title: Team In Training \- Disease Information - Hairy Cell Leukemia
snippet.description: Team In Training \- Disease Information - Hairy Cell Leukemia The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society's Team In Training is the world's largest endurance sports-training program preparing individuals to run or walk a whole or half marathon or participate in a triathlon or century (100-mile) bike ride

snippet.title: Palo Alto - CrossFit Palo Alto
snippet.description: Palo Alto - CrossFit Palo Alto CFPA provides clients with a personal training experience in a group setting while delivering comprehensive health and fitness programming. With experience in training National level athletes, ultra-marathon runners of 50 mile races, elite SWAT Team members, at-home mommy’s and grandparents, we have developed a fitness program that is second to none. We provide a general conditioning programming that includes injury prevention training and coaching. Our focus is a core strength and conditioning program that is constantly varied to create a stimulus like no other.

snippet.title: Plymouth - Associates in Podiatry of Michigan
snippet.description: Plymouth - Associates in Podiatry of Michigan Former athletes and current marathon runners, Drs. Ronald and Vanessa Adelman understand firsthand the impact of an ankle or foot injury. Drawing from personal experience and extensive training, the Drs. Adelman emphasize patient education and believe in providing patients with all available treatment options.

snippet.title: Marathon Walking
snippet.description: Marathon Walking Information and tips on walking marathons. Includes training schedules, marathon calendar, and testimonials.
